name: Guardian Of Space
description:
Why:

I just started getting back into coding and music creation, so I decided to make a game to go along with it. It's relatively short, and the music is definitely a bop. For a first-time project, I think it turned out pretty decent. Give it a try if you'd like, and thanks for stopping by. The music bops!

Goal: 

Your goal is to protect your planet from enemy spells and asteroids. The planet has 10 health, and you control the Guardian Cat to block incoming enemies.

Controls: 

Use either (A) and (D) or (Arrow-key Left) and (Arrow-key Right) to move the guardian to the left or right.

Specifications:

For now only Computer friendly, soon I'll make it mobile friendly.

"Please leave a comment if you enjoyed!!" - Ocramaru
